targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time("time"), 
  "size"  AS "Transaction count"
FROM  mempool_data
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__time("time"), 
  "size_diff"  AS "Transaction diff"
FROM  mempool_data
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Change in number of transactions in mempool

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time("time"), 
  "bytes"  AS "vbytes"
FROM  mempool_data
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Sum of all virtual transaction sizes of txs in mempool

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time("time"), 
  "bytes_diff"  AS "vbytes_diff"
FROM  mempool_data
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Change in sum of all virtual transaction sizes of txs in mempool

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time("time"), 
  "mempool_min_fee" AS "Mempool min fee"
FROM  mempool_data
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__time("time"), 
  "mempool_min_fee_diff" AS "Change in mempool min fee"
FROM  mempool_data
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[29] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 400 to 500 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[30] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 500 to 600 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[31] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 600 to 700 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[32] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 700 to 800 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[33] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 800 to 1000 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[34] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 1000 to 1200 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[35] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 1200 to 1400 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[36] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 1400 to 1700 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[37] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 1700 to 2000 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[38] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 2000 to 2500 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[39] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 2500 to 3000 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[40] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 3000 to 4000 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[41] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 4000 to 5000 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[42] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 5000 to 6000 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[43] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 6000 to 7000 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[44] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 7000 to 8000 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[45] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 8000 to 10000 sats/vbyte",
"total_fee_per_fee_bucket"[46] AS "Sum of fees of txs with feerate: 10000 to 2.1e+15 sats/vbyte"
FROM  mempool_data
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Total fee (in BTC) of transactions by feerate
